full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Notice of Proposed Procurement

#### Solicitation Number: #405

*   **Title: Financial Instruments Valuation - Business Development Bank of Canada (BDC)**
*   **Reference Number:**cb-23-34941756
*   **Publication Date:** November 10, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 27, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** Not specified
*   **Tender Status:** Expired

### Notice Type and Procurement Method

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Selective Tendering

### Description of the Requirement

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada, in collaboration with KPMG, is conducting a comprehensive annual audit of the financial statements of the Business Development Bank of Canada (BDC). To support this audit, the OAG requires a contractor to provide 3 resources with subject matter expertise to perform the activities outlined in the Statement of Work.

### Level of Security Requirement

*   **Minimum Security Level Required:** Reliability Status
*   **Deliverables Security Level:** Protected B

### Applicable Trade Agreements

*   **List of Applicable Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and other relevant agreements.

### Proposed Contract Period

*   **Initial Contract Period:** Approximately seven (7) months
*   **Option Periods:** Three (3) additional one (1) year option periods
*   **Contract Completion Date:** June 30, 2024

### Contracting Entity and Contact Information

*   **Contracting Entity:** Office of the Auditor General of Canada
*   **Contact Information:** Soo Yeon Cho (suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca), (613) 952-0213
*   **Contact Address:** 240 Sparks Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0G6, Canada

### Eligibility and Pre-qualification

*   **Eligible Contractors:** Only Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement holders who have qualified under Sub Stream 3A - Financial Instruments Valuation under the SA369 series of SAs.
*   **Pre-qualification:** Suppliers can pre-qualify for the Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement by visiting Canada
